name: Boomerang Boy
description:
Boomerang Boy was made in 48 hours for ludum dare 37. Other platforms are coming.

I will probably work on this further.

Controls:

  • Walk left and right with the arrow keys
  • Jump with x
  • Hold c and the release to throw boomerang. If you hold down longer, the throw will be more powerful. While charging up the game is in slowmo.
